means: 想出( conceive的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The intelligence service conceived a grand design to assassinate the War Minister.
sentence.Network_cn: 情报机构策划了一项暗杀陆军部长的重大计划。

sentence.Network_en: Ellis bristles at accusations that Berkeley's experiment is ill-conceived.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃利斯对有人指责伯克利的实验考虑不够周密感到气愤。

sentence.Network_en: She had conceived the idea of a series of novels.
sentence.Network_cn: 她萌生出撰写系列小说的想法。

PerfectNetExp.abs: four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent a new nation , conceived in Liberty , and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal .八十七年以前，我们的祖先在这大陆上建立了一个国家，它孕育于自由，并且献身给一种理念，即所有人都是生来平等的。
God gave heed to Leah , and she conceived and bore Jacob a fifth son ., 神应允了利亚 , 她就怀孕 , 给雅各生了第五个儿子.
conceived in liberty , and to the proposition that all men are created equal., 它产生于自由之中 , 并奉行所有人生来平等的原则.
She conceived last February ., 她去年 2月份怀了孕.

list.abs: ...conceived vt.构思,以为,持有;vi 怀孕,考虑,设想,常用过去分词conceive prejudices抱偏见convinced adj. 确信的,深信的;v. 说服
Baby panda dies 熊猫宝宝不幸夭折 ... revive 抢救，使复活 conceived naturally 自然受孕 chronicled avidly 热情的记载和报道.
compensate for 补偿，赔偿conceive of 设想，构思出-
To beget and conceive offspring ; reproduce ., 生育和孕育后代 ; 繁殖.

entry.def: If you cannot conceive of something, you cannot imagine it or believe it.

example.ex: I just can't even conceive of that quantity of money...
example.tran: 那么多钱，我根本都无法想象。

example.ex: He was immensely ambitious but unable to conceive of winning power for himself.
example.tran: 他雄心勃勃，但是想不出自己能如何赢得权力。

entry.def: If you conceive something as a particular thing, you consider it to be that thing.

example.ex: The ancients conceived the earth as afloat in water...
example.tran: 古人认为地球飘浮在水里。

example.ex: We conceive of the family as being in a constant state of change...
example.tran: 我们认为家庭处于不断变化之中。

entry.def: If you conceive a plan or idea, you think of it and work out how it can be done.

example.ex: She had conceived the idea of a series of novels...
example.tran: 她萌生出撰写系列小说的想法。

example.ex: He conceived of the first truly portable computer in 1968.
example.tran: 1968年，他构想出第一台真正的便携式计算机。

entry.def: When a woman conceives, she becomes pregnant.

example.ex: Women, he says, should give up alcohol before they plan to conceive...
example.tran: 他说女性在计划怀孕之前应该戒酒。

example.ex: About one in six couples has difficulty conceiving...
example.tran: 大约1/6的夫妻有受孕困难。

auth_sentence.content: To establish a pre-conceived theory...the historian sometimes distorted facts.
auth_sentence.res_content: To establish a pre-conceived theory...the historian sometimes distorted facts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To establish a pre-conceived theory...the historian sometimes distorted facts.

auth_sentence.content: When Darwin first conceived of evolution it was a concept.
auth_sentence.res_content: When Darwin first conceived of evolution it was a concept.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When Darwin first conceived of evolution it was a concept.

auth_sentence.content: No one will be conceived during the show.
auth_sentence.res_content: No one will be conceived during the show.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No one will be conceived during the show.
